'''0.98<ref>{{link |url=https://kulttuuri.tumblr.com/post/18860318283/minecraftedu-098|title=MinecraftEdu 0.98 |website=Tumblr |date=May 6, 2012|author=Aleksi Postari}}</ref>''' is a major update to MinecraftEdu, which adds a new block and a new tab for the teacher menu. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.1]].{{Info needed}}

== Additions ==
=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Teleport block.png|width=32x32]] [[Teleport Block]]'''
* Teleport blocks Teleport the player to the location that the player set in the world.
* Teacher permissions:
** Use & set visibility for teleport blocks anytime.
** Break teleport blocks anytime.
** Use teleport blocks if there is a build allow block below the teleport station.

== Changes ==
=== General ===
'''Title screen'''
* Changed logo from [[File:MinecraftEdu logo 3.png|width=133x133]] to [[File:MinecraftEdu logo 2.png|width=133x133]].

'''Teacher menu'''
* Added a new tab for '''stations'''
** <u>[[Teacher Menu#Stations|Stations]]</u>.
* Go to any teleport station in the world. Only if the player saves a station with the teleport block
